name: Prime-Line Aluminum Patio Door Handle Set with Wood Pull
description: This keyed patio door handle set is constructed from aluminum and includes a wood pull. It features a reversible design and automatic unlatching to prevent accidental lockout. This handle fits 1 in. thick rails and is used by Viking doors.Designed to fit 90% of all internally latched doorsComplete with keeperLocking unit with keyAutomatic unlatching options prevents accidental lockout
